p: Zhang and coworkers recently evaluated the antiarthritic potential of Zingiberaceae plant EOs, including Alpinia galanga (L.) Willd., Alpinia oxyphylla Miq., Amomum kravanh Pierre ex Gagnep., and Kaempferia galanga L. [ 52]. These species were demonstrated to down-regulate the expression levels of COX-2, TNF-α, IL-6, and IL-1 in Freund’s adjuvant-induced arthritic rats, with K. galanga being the most effective one.
